snippet.title: Oxygen Not Included: Spaced Out! Expansion DLC Launch 🚀 [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
3...2...1...blast off! The brand-new Oxygen Not Included DLC is fully launched and available now on🚀 Steam: https://klei.gg/SpacedOutSteam  & 👨‍🚀 Epic Games: https://klei.gg/SpacedOutEpic 
The Duplicants are back, and this time they’re ready to rocket into space to rebuild their colonies on a whole host of strange new planetoids!

In Oxygen Not Included: Spaced Out!, you'll spearhead space missions to new and undiscovered planetoids, transport resources between bases, and manage multiple worlds on the fly to build a megacolony that not only survives, but hopefully, thrives.

Find all the details and info in the link below!

🛰️More Info Here: https://klei.gg/SpacedOutLaunch

We wanted to give special thanks to LiveActionPixel. He regularly streams #OxygenNotIncluded on Twitch giving tips with his clever & beautiful base builds. He generously provided save files that helped us make this trailer. 

Give him a follow! 
https://twitch.tv/liveactionpixel
-------------------------------------------
